plot: The Western films of iconic director John Ford are fondly remembered by stars James Stewart, Henry Fonda, and Jon Wayne, with whom he shoots a scene in Monument Valley.
title: The American West of John Ford
plot_es: The Western films of iconic director John Ford are fondly remembered by stars James Stewart, Henry Fonda, and Jon Wayne, with whom he shoots a scene in Monument Valley.
original_name: The American West of John Ford
plot_en: The Western films of iconic director John Ford are fondly remembered by stars James Stewart, Henry Fonda, and Jon Wayne, with whom he shoots a scene in Monument Valley.
